questions.question: What does the LIMIT keyword do in MySQL?
What is the syntax to get the first 5 rows in a result set?
Which clause is typically used along with LIMIT?
What will LIMIT 0 do?
What is the result of LIMIT 1?
Can LIMIT be used without ORDER BY?
What does LIMIT 3, 5 mean?
How do you get the last row using LIMIT?
Which is correct to get 10 rows starting from 6th?
What is LIMIT used for in pagination?
Write a query to get the top 10 highest paid employees.
options: SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT TOP 10 * FROM employees ORDER BY salary;
SELECT * FROM employees LIMIT 10 ORDER BY salary DESC;
GET TOP 10 FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 10;

questions.question: Get first 3 customers from the customer table.
Fetch next 5 rows after skipping the first 2.
Retrieve only one student with the highest marks.
options: SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY marks DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM students ORDER BY marks;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY marks DESC LIMIT 1;

questions.question: Query to display top 5 oldest books by publish_date.
options: SELECT * FROM books ORDER BY publish_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT TOP 5 * FROM books ORDER BY publish_date;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE publish_date LIMIT 5;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM books ORDER BY publish_date ASC LIMIT 5;

questions.question: Show only first product from product table.
Get the latest 3 records from logs table.
options: SELECT * FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * LIMIT 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;

questions.question: Fetch top 2 employees by experience.
options: SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY experience DESC LIMIT 2;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY experience LIMIT 2;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY experience DESC LIMIT 2;

questions.question: Return 7th to 10th orders.
Display the 3rd product by price.
options: SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price LIMIT 2, 1;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM products LIMIT 3 ORDER BY price;
SELECT price FROM products LIMIT 2 TO 3;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price LIMIT 2, 1;
